name: They're Turned (demo)
description:
This is a simple 2d shooter that is my first game. don't hate if you find a bug or a glitch. tell me what you found and i will try to fix it. this was made with a game engine i am not vary familiar with so i will try my best to fix it. i probably won't though. Thanks for clicking on my game and enjoy!

Controls: w to walk, space to shoot, 1 and 2 to change guns, and mouse to look
